content.raw:
I'll do some testing on mac and windows later today and update here but this definitely sounds great.

Update:
Ok everything looking fine on macOS the mouse turns into the tab on drag which is really nice. But there is one thing that I noticed that is strange: When pulling the tab outside of the window the tab animation vanishes and it's just the mouse. I'll create a gif to demonstrate. (This should not really happen that often anyway)

![dragdrop-3.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xg9BdE/images/2586118514-dragdrop-3.gif)

Upate 2.0: Ok so the tab vanishing is linked to the mouse crossing a window edge that allows resizing if I exit the window through the top everything is fine.

Update 3.0: Under windows there is no animation at all (PyQt4). Also the mac test happened under PyQt5 and PyQt4.
